snippet.title: Xenoblade Chronicles Definitive Edition - Nintendo Direct Mini 3.26.20 - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Xenoblade Chronicles Definitive Edition arrives on 5/29! Experience this modern classic with updated graphics, improved battle HUD and menus, more than 90 remastered music tracks, and an all-new epilogue story with Melia and Shulk in Xenoblade Chronicles: Future Connected.

#XenobladeChronicles #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
